name: MS Paint IDE
description: A program to use a custom OCR (NewOCR) to read images and parse them as code, performing IDE actions including compilation, syntax highlighting, buildsystem support, basic refactoring, LSP integration, and Google Assistant support.

name: Craftathon
description: Lead the team at the charity organization Craftathon, raising $7,600 for children in domestic violence homes and shelters.

name: HolySheet
description: Developed an unlimited cold file storage system by efficiently encoding them into Google Sheets. This is serverless and highly scaleable with Docker & Kubernetes, hosted on AWS. The system is accessible through a file browser web app, native desktop app, CLI, REST API, gRPC API, and Java API.

name: NewOCR
description: Constructed an OCR from scratch, with 98+% accuracy on all printable ASCII characters on trained fonts. Designed to read computer-generated text of an arbitrary size on a trained font, and provide typeset data used to reconstruct the input image with modified text. This project cited several research papers on similar technology to make a unique detection system.

name: BYOB
description: A GitHub Action and service to allow for dynamically updated README badges from GitHub Action triggers.

name: ChatFilter
description: A fast and highly configurable chat filter, targeted to be used in multiplayer games. Made for Craftathon, with benchmarking and full specifications available.

name: EmojIDE
description: A working and reactive IDE in Discord emojis, featuring emoji management across 41 Discord servers. This was made for the r/ProgrammerHumor Hackathon, getting second place.

name: BFJVM
description: A program to compile Brainfuck into JVM classes without the use of any libraries or external tools for compiling.

name: Notedown
description: A markdown-based note taking app made in Flutter. Complete with Google authentication for cross-platform syncing.

name: Spogit
description: Spotify playlists over Git. This allows for pushing playlists to Git servers such as GitHub, and making forks and PRs to other people's playlists.

name: BinaryCamera
description: BinaryCamera's goal is to allow the user to type in their computer using nothing but their light. The binary is typed in by turning their light on/off as ones and zeros, recorded through their webcam.

name: CodeFormatter
description: Formats your code (Or whole GitHub repos) by moving all brackets and semicolons to the side in a perfect line to match your perfect code.

name: WSS
description: Convert nested CSS into full webpages, with the ability to recreate any webpage in just CSS.
